description: This file contains configuration sets, feature flags, and build parameters specific to the Cortex-A53 architecture in a Yocto Project build system. It defines tuning options for 32-bit and 64-bit variants, including compiler flags, architecture-specific features, and package architecture settings.

methods.name: require
methods.description: Includes another configuration file to build upon or extend.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: Utility function to conditionally include compiler flags based on features.
